title: First State National Historical Park: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go                   Beaver Valley               Fort Christina               Old Swedes Church               New Castle Court House               The Green, Dover               John Dickinson Plantation               Ryves Holt House               Reflection of New Castle. NPS  First State National Historical Park is made up of seven different sites. For more information about each individual location, click on the site name below. New Castle County Beaver Valley  Fort Christina Old Swedes Church New Castle Court House Kent County The Green, Dover John Dickinson Plantation Sussex County Ryves Holt House      Travel and Tourism Delaware Tourism: http://www.visitdelaware.com/ Delaware State Parks: http://www.destateparks.com/park/first-state-heritage/index.asp City of Dover: http://www.cityofdover.com/Visitors-Center/  New Castle: http://www.go-delaware.com/New-Castle-Delaware/Attractions/  Greater Wilmington Convention and Visitors Bureau: http://www.visitwilmingtonde.com Kent County and Greater Dover, Delaware Convention and Visitors Bureau: http://www.visitdover.com/
